confirmModal.body: Please confirm to update changed values
confirmModal.title: Confirm update request

payload.rawSql:
INSERT INTO
  `db-teg-test1`.device_locations (
    device_id,
    client_id,
    location_id,
    variable_id,
    sensor_id,
    min,
    max,
    offset,
    calibration_factor,
    status
  )
VALUES
  (
    ${payload.device_id},
    ${_client_id},
    ${payload.location_id},
    ${payload.variable_id},
    ${payload.sensor_id},
    ${payload.min},
    ${payload.max},
    ${payload.offset},
    ${payload.calibration_factor},
    ${payload.status}
  )

targets.rawSql:
select
  s.id,
  CONCAT_WS('@', s.name, s.serial) name_serial,
  dl.id device_id
from
  `db-teg-test1`.sensors s
  left join `db-teg-test1`.device_locations dl on dl.sensor_id = s.id
  where dl.id IS NULL

SELECT
  l.id,
  l.name
FROM
  `db-teg-test1`.locations l
  INNER JOIN `db-teg-test1`.clients c on c.id = l.client_id
WHERE
  c.name = '$_client' and l.status != 0;

payload.rawSql:
UPDATE `db-teg-test1`.device_locations
SET 
    device_id = '${payload.mac_address}',
    client_id = '${_client_id}',
    location_id = '${payload.location_id}',
    variable_id = '${payload.variable_id}',
    sensor_id = '${payload.sensor_id}',
    min = '${payload.min}',
    max = '${payload.max}',
    offset = '${payload.offset}',
    calibration_factor = '${payload.calibration_factor}',
    status = case when '${payload.status}' = 'true' then 1 else 0 end
WHERE id = '${payload.id}';

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  dl.id,
  d.mac_address device_id,
  CONCAT_WS('@', s.name, s.serial) sensor_id,
  l.name location_id,
  v.name variable_id,
  dl.min,
  dl.max,
  dl.offset,
  dl.calibration_factor,
  dl.status
FROM
  `db-teg-test1`.device_locations dl
  INNER JOIN `db-teg-test1`.variables v ON dl.variable_id = v.id
  INNER JOIN `db-teg-test1`.devices d ON d.id = dl.device_id
  INNER JOIN `db-teg-test1`.locations l ON dl.location_id = l.id
  AND d.client_id = l.client_id
  INNER JOIN `db-teg-test1`.clients c ON dl.client_id = c.id
  INNER JOIN `db-teg-test1`.sensors s ON dl.sensor_id = s.id
where
  c.name = '$_client'
  order by dl.id;

SELECT
  d.id,
  d.mac_address
FROM
  `db-teg-test1`.devices d
  INNER JOIN `db-teg-test1`.clients c ON c.id = d.client_id
WHERE
  c.id = $_client_id
  AND d.status != 0;

SELECT
  v.id,
  v.name
FROM
  `db-teg-test1`.variables v
WHERE
  v.status != 0;

SELECT
  l.id,
  l.name
FROM
  `db-teg-test1`.locations l
  INNER JOIN `db-teg-test1`.clients c ON c.id = l.client_id
WHERE
  c.id = $_client_id
  AND l.status != 0;

select
  s.id,
  CONCAT_WS('@', s.name, s.serial) name_serial
from
  `db-teg-test1`.sensors s
  left join `db-teg-test1`.device_locations dl on dl.sensor_id = s.id
  where dl.id IS NULL
